item.title: Intro to Emacs lisp
item.description: A basic overview of elisp to start crafting plugins and customizing Emacs. For more details see docs Comments Semicolon ;; defines comment enywhere in a line 0 ;; Some text as comment Arithmetic 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 (+ 3 2 1) ;; 6 (- 8 5) ;; 3 (* 3 4) ;; 12 (/ 1 2.0) ;; 0.5 (/ 1 2) ;; 0 (% 12 5) ;; 2 (expt 3 4) ;; 81 Type conversions 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 (float 6) ;; 6.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
